title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 470.1 - Superseded regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 470.1 - Superseded regulations

State Regulations
(a) Each and every rule and regulation promulgated by the Industrial Commissioner
and effective before June 5, 1944 is superseded by the regulations promulgated
and effective beginning with such date. (b) Rules and regulations which were in
effect before June 5, 1944 and which are superseded in accordance with
subdivision (a) of this section shall continue to govern employers' and
employees' rights and obligations for the period preceding such date. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
470.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
